1
BEFORE THE SPECIAL COURT AT BOMBAY

RELATING TO TRANSACTJONS IN SECURITIES) ACT, 1992

Central Bureau of Investigation
..... Complainant.

.... Accused No.1.

.... Accused No.2.

Special Public Prosecutors
for C.B.I. 2

CORAM: V.M. KANADE, J.
Judge, Special Court
DATE
: 7th March, 2008 & 1st April, 2008
